title: Galadriel, Lady of Light (1R45)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Ally • Home 6 • Elf
Strength:	3
Vitality:	3
Site:	6
Game Text:	At the start of each of your turns, heal every ally whose home is site 6. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play an Elf for free.
Lore:	“Very tall they were, and the Lady no less tall than the Lord; and they were grave and beautiful … and the hair of the Lady was of deep gold….”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Lists: EXL, MXL. The twilight cost of an Elf played using Galadriel's text is zero, and cannot be raised or lowered.
